skillTree.localised_description: Pugnacious and stubborn, the war beasts that pull these ramshackle chariots are grotesque combinations of great boar and mighty ram.
Those strong enough to tame the powerful, unruly Razorgors can harness them for chariots.
He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.
Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Spreads like fire!

effects.description:
Attrition: +10% casualties suffered from Chaos Undivided corruption and Chaos Wastes attrition
	(enemy armies in province)
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells

skillTree.localised_description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
Item defiled through dark rituals deep within the forests.

effects.description:
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
	(accompanying Lord)

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: Drain the power of your enemies and crush them.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: -10
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy miscast base chance: +10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The Bray-Shaman magnifies the savage and animalistic parts of the foe's psyche until they are no more than growling beasts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Devolve Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The Bray-Shaman inflames the uncontrollable urge to rend the foe limb from limb, causing the roaring, bellowing mass to surge forward.
This spell unleashes a howling roar of such intensity that it mashes brains and bursts eyeballs.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Bray-Scream Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A vile wave indeed, the creeping things that nest in the decaying undergrowth swarm all over the foe.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Viletide Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A red-hot spear of wrath is driven into enemy mounts' wild hearts, causing them to turn upon their riders.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Traitor-Kin Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Ghorok was a legendary Minotaur, ferocious as a storm. His spirit-mantle is terrible and dangerous to the bearer.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Mantle of Ghorok Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Mantle of Ghorok"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Mantle of Ghorok Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: The Bray-Shaman sends his mind into the wilds, possessing the largest creature he can find and storming back with a vengeance.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5 for "Savage Dominion"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 1% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 2% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 4% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldierâ€™s mundane weapons.

Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this oneâ€™s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Chaos Undivided corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.
More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has something of the compost heap about themâ€¦
Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.
Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This spell calls to the creeping things of the undergrowth, sending a swarm of spiders, centipedes and slug-beetles onto the foe.
Blessed by the Dark Gods to never feel pain.
His scent is strong even amongst the herd.
Ungors obey!

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Melee and missile weapon damage: +10% for Ungor units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Herds crumble but he stands.
Wild as a warhound, he never sleeps.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Chaos Warhounds and Harpies units.
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always watching and stalking his pray!

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(all units in army)
